name: Midnight
overview: Midnight is an arcade platform game. An old wizard Al is going to destroy the Hrkach Castle. As all the servants run away you are now alone. There is only one way to save the castle. The player's task is to make light in all rooms in the castle as AI is afraid of the light. The wizard will arrive within four hours - at midnight. You must pick up the candles and place them on the candle sticks. You must also pick up the keys and use them to open doors. There are some creatures, which makes your mission difficult. Contact with them means sudden death.
